text: Tamsui is the terminal metro station on the Tamsui-Xinyi Line in New Taipei, Taiwan. The station code is R28. == Station layout information == The station platforms are above ground level. Both Platforms 1 and 2 are for Xiangshan. == Around the station == * Tamsui Art Gallery * Tamsui Customs Wharf * Tamsui Historical Museum Category:Railway stations in Taipei
title: Tamsui metro station
